biotools.summary: A robust, efficient and reproducible diffusion MRI pipeline leveraging Nextflow & Singularity | Files needed to build a Singularity container to run the TractoFlow pipeline | Singularity related files for TractoFlow | The TractoFlow pipeline is a fully automated and reproducible dMRI processing pipeline. TractoFlow takes raw DWI, b-values, b-vectors, T1 weighted image (and a reversed phase encoded b=0 if available) to process DTI, fODF metrics and a whole brain tractogram

bioschemas.name: TractoFlow
